msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.{StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType}
import org.apache.spark.sql.{DataFrame, Dataset, Encoders, SparkSession}

schema: org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType = StructType(StructField(AcquisitionID,StringType,true), StructField(AcquisitionMonth,StringType,true), StructField(AcquisitionMonthDate,IntegerType,true), StructField(AcquisitionYear,IntegerType,true), StructField(Company,StringType,true), StructField(Business,StringType,true), StructField(Country,StringType,true), StructField(Value,IntegerType,true), StructField(Derived,StringType,true), StructField(ParentCompany,StringType,true))

warning: there was one deprecation warning; re-run with -deprecation for details
df: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [AcquisitionID: string, AcquisitionMonth: string ... 8 more fields]
res2: Array[String] = Array(AcquisitionID, AcquisitionMonth, AcquisitionMonthDate, AcquisitionYear, Company, Business, Country, Value, Derived, ParentCompany)

root
 |-- AcquisitionID: string (nullable = true)
 |-- AcquisitionMonth: string (nullable = true)
 |-- AcquisitionMonthDate: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- AcquisitionYear: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- Company: string (nullable = true)
 |-- Business: string (nullable = true)
 |-- Country: string (nullable = true)
 |-- Value: integer (nullable = true)
 |-- Derived: string (nullable = true)
 |-- ParentCompany: string (nullable = true)

paragraphs.text:
%sql --- Problem 2: Veritabanında ilk 12 satırı gösteriniz. ---
select * from acquisitions limit 12

paragraphs.text:
%sql --- Problem 4: Google ve Microsoft şirketlerinin bulut yazılım alanında yaptığı satın almaları gösteriniz. ---
select * from acquisitions where (ParentCompany="Microsoft" or ParentCompany="Google")
and Business="Cloud software"

%sql --- Problem 6: Açıklanan değerlere göre en fazla parcanan yatırımları fiyata göre değerlendiriniz. ---
select AcquisitionYear, Company, Value, ParentCompany,
case when Value>=250000000 then 'Yuksek'
when Value<250000000 and Value>=20000000 then 'Orta'
when Value<20000000 then 'Dusuk' end as Price from acquisitions where Value > 0

paragraphs.text:
%sql --- Problem 7: Ana şirketlerin 2015 yılında yaptığını satın alma sayısını gösteriniz. ---
select distinct ParentCompany, Count(AcquisitionID) from acquisitions
where AcquisitionYear=2015 group by ParentCompany

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
ParentCompany	count(AcquisitionID)
Yahoo	1
IBM	13
Twitter	8
Google	15
Microsoft	19
Apple	10
Facebook	6

paragraphs.text:
%sql --- Problem 8: Ana şirketlerin 2000-2018 yılları arasında yıl başı satın alma ortalamalarını bulunuz. ---
select distinct ParentCompany, Count(AcquisitionID)/18 as Average_Acquisition from acquisitions
where AcquisitionYear>=2000 and AcquisitionYear<2018 group by ParentCompany

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
ParentCompany	Average_Acquisition
Yahoo	5.666666666666667
IBM	9.0
Twitter	2.9444444444444446
Google	11.88888888888889
Microsoft	8.944444444444445
Apple	4.666666666666667
Facebook	3.6666666666666665

paragraphs.text:
%sql --- Problem 9: Big Data alanına en çok yatırım yapan şirketi bulunuz. ---
select distinct ParentCompany, Count(AcquisitionID) from acquisitions where Business like "%big data%" group by ParentCompany

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql --- Problem 10: Yıla göre satın alma miktarlarını bulup en çok satın alan şirketi satın alma sayısına göre büyükten küçüğe sıralayınız. ---
select distinct AcquisitionYear, Count(AcquisitionID) as count from acquisitions
group by AcquisitionYear order by count desc

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql --- Problem 11: 2015 yılında 7 veya daha fazla satın alma yapan şirketleri gösteriniz. ---
select distinct ParentCompany, Count(AcquisitionID) as Acquisition_Number
from acquisitions where AcquisitionYear=2015 group by ParentCompany having Acquisition_Number>=7

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
ParentCompany	Acquisition_Number
IBM	13
Twitter	8
Google	15
Microsoft	19
Apple	10

paragraphs.text:
%sql --- Problem 12: Ana şirketlerin 2015 ve 2016 yıllarında satın almalara harcadığı toplam para miktarını bulunuz. ---
select distinct ParentCompany, SUM(VALUE) as Total_Spending
from acquisitions where (AcquisitionYear=2016 or AcquisitionYear=2015) and VALUE>0
group by ParentCompany
